channel.title: Tokkul shops?
channel.description: ok so i just figured out how to add shops the other day. now i want to make the economy good + so people have to work for things, so i wanted to add an tokkul shop. Any way for me to change the money currency to tokkul? i looked at many tutorials, but none helped. i'm on a [pi]. please help. -Thanks

item.title: Tokkul shops?
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

ok i kinda figured it out. i deleted the first part because i looked at the other ones and they didnt have it. ok now i have the problem with the shop where i cant buy anything. i click on the shop. it opens, i click on item and it says (0points) and try to buy and it wont let me… how to i fix this? and set my own price/tokkul for this?

item.title: Tokkul shops?
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:5, topic:396560”]In your ShopAssistant class, search for:

for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {

And you should see things like this:

			for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {
				TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
				Slot = c.getItems().getItemSlot(995);
				Slot1 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529);
				Slot3 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(5555);
				if (Slot == -1 && c.myShopId != 11 && c.myShopId != 29 && c.myShopId != 30 && c.myShopId != 31) {
					c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins.");
					break;
				}

Under that, add:

				if(Slot1 == -1 && c.myShopId == SHOP_ID) {
					c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul.");
					break;
				}

And it should take tokkul.[/quote]

there was 2 errors. i fixed the shop ID and put my id but what do i do with “slot1”?

Read full topic

item.title: Tokkul shops?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

In your ShopAssistant class, search for:

for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {

And you should see things like this:

			for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {
				TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
				Slot = c.getItems().getItemSlot(995);
				Slot1 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529);
				Slot3 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(5555);
				if (Slot == -1 && c.myShopId != 11 && c.myShopId != 29 && c.myShopId != 30 && c.myShopId != 31) {
					c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins.");
					break;
				}

Under that, add:

				if(Slot1 == -1 && c.myShopId == SHOP_ID) {
					c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul.");
					break;
				}

And it should take tokkul.

Read full topic
